name: Mado's Big Bite (Closed)
address: 3/5 El Safa building, 280 street. Off Ellaselky st., Shop 6

Sandwiches.description: Stir-fried Beef strips with rich Oyster and Sweet Chili sauce cooked to perfection with just the right touch of Spices.
Big chunks of Chicken thighs marinated with our exquisite home made BBQ sauce on a bed of melted Cheddar cheese.
Savor the exotic taste of our Prawn and Crab meat prepared in our Sweet Chili sauce.
Indulge yourself in a new blend of flavors. Seasoned Chicken breast with Mushrooms, onions and green Bell Peppers on a bed of Mayonnaise and melted Cheddar Cheese.
Juicy chunks of Chicken thighs mixed with Mushroom and Bacon together marinated with strained yogurt, served on a bed of melted Cheddar cheese.
Savor our Rib Eye steak strips mixed with Mushroom and crispy Bacon juiced with our splendid marinade and Mushroom sauce on a bed of melted Cheddar cheese.

Salads.description: Home made Coleslaw of freshly shredded Cabbage and Carrots, served with two slices of our signature Boule de Campagne.
Mixed red Beans and sweet Corn tossed in Olive oil toped with Mushrooms and sliced Onions, served with 2 slices of our signature Boule de Campagne.
Mixed vegetables tossed in Italian dressing topped with flaked smoked Tuna and Crab meat, served with 2 slices of our signature Boule de Campagne.
Steamed Potato cubes dressed with Mayonnaise and our home made sour cream with a pinch of Dill with 2 slices of our signature Boule de Campagne.
Fusili Pasta tossed with Stir-fried Hot Dog slices and Pickles and our exquisite Pesto sauce.
Mini cubes of home made Potatoes, stir-fried with Chili Pepper
Diced Tomato tossed with our Zestful Olive Oil dressing with a pinch of fresh Basil. Served with 2 slices of Boule de Campagne.

Sides.description: Remember how Home made French fries tasted so much better? Try these thick-cut golden Fries for the taste you have been missing for so long.

Sides.dish_name: Cheese Garlic Bread with Crispy Bacon
Sides.description: Craving our traditional Cheesy Garlic bread? We've just added a bed of crispy Beef Bacon for perfection. (3- 6- 9 pcs)
Enjoy our Garlic bread with a savory blend of Herbs, melted Mozzarella and Old Amsterdam cheese. (3-6-9 pcs)

There's a new meaning to Garlic bread when it comes from MADO'S BIG BITE. Its not only about the taste, It�s the texture and aroma. Indulge yourself in these crispy buttered Garlic bread bites. (3-6-9 pcs)
Snack on these tender bite-size Chicken pieces. Breaded in our Home made mix, deep fried to perfection. Try these bites with your choice of dip.

Extras.description: Sweet Chili- BBQ- Garlic Paste- Hot sauce- Chili Paste- Honey Mustard.

Chips.description: It�s the Big Beefer experience. Savor these steak strips with Mushroom sauce served on top of a bed of crispy Fries.
Have it the way you like. Tender chicken chunks buttered and served in your choice of BBQ or Yogurt sauce on crispy golden Fries.
For the Seafood lovers, You'll enjoy the exotic blend of flavors of Shrimp and Crab cooked in Sweet Chili sauce on crispy golden Fries.
